mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select fno, seq, id, title, is_domestic, to_char(dateStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dateStart, to_char(dateEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dateEnd, is_finish, kakao_chat, to_char(date_of_issue, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date_of_issue from friends order by fno desc) tt) where rn between #{startNum} and #{endNum}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT fno FROM friends WHERE seq = #{seq} order by fno desc) where rownum = 1

SELECT fno, seq, id, title, is_domestic, to_char(dateStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dateStart, to_char(dateEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dateEnd, is_finish, kakao_chat, to_char(date_of_issue, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as date_of_issue FROM friends WHERE fno = #{fno}
SELECT fcno, fccno, seq, content, is_permit, to_char(dateStart, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dateStart, to_char(dateEnd, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as dateEnd, is_read FROM friend_request WHERE fcno = #{fcno}
